title: Gravity Intro (Advance)
intro: Welcome to the advanced level of understanding gravity. In this lesson, we will delve deeper into the complexities of gravity and its effects on the universe.
outro: Congratulations! You have completed the advanced level of understanding gravity. You are now equipped with a deeper knowledge of this fundamental force in nature.

concepts.name: Gravity Advanced Concepts
concepts.explain: Gravity is not just a force that pulls objects towards each other, but also warps space-time according to Einstein's general theory of relativity. This warping of space-time is what creates the gravitational attraction between objects.
concepts.example: Consider the analogy of placing a heavy ball on a stretched rubber sheet. The ball creates a dent in the sheet, causing smaller objects placed on it to move towards the ball. This visualization represents how massive objects like planets warp the fabric of space-time around them, leading to gravitational effects.

check.question: According to Einstein's general theory of relativity, how does gravity affect space-time?
check.desired_answer: Gravity warps space-time, creating the gravitational attraction between objects.
